title: Crazy Bird Lady and Hamster thing vandalise buildings
body:
after an intense 29 minute game of watching our draven adc split push a lane till he died I decided I had enough and ran it down the top lane to end the game

shoutout to noxu for helping me the entire game :)


Lets make {{champion:17}} great again

replies.body: This is the Bronzest thing I've ever seen.
